generatedFromSchema_doNotEdit.title: Minecraft Behavior.charge Attack Entity
generatedFromSchema_doNotEdit.description: Allows this entity to damage a target by using a running attack.

fields.title: Max Distance
fields.description: A charge attack cannot start if the entity is farther than this distance to the target. Default value: 3.

fields.title: Min Distance
fields.description: A charge attack cannot start if the entity is closer than this distance to the target. Default value: 2.

fields.title: Speed Multiplier
fields.description: Modifies the entity's speed when charging toward the target. Default value: 1.

fields.title: Success Rate
fields.description: Percent chance this entity will start a charge attack, if not already attacking (1.0 = 100%). Default value: 0.1428.
